lines: Don’t you look handsome my dear.
Oh my, you shouldn’t be afraid of a strong woman.
I know my way around, you know.
This pretty head isn’t just a hat rack. You won’t regret my company.
I can be a hoot and your fellow companions will love me, not just for my dazzling looks.
options: Promise a place in your carriage

lines: Thank you. I shall see you on board.
I will stay here then. That is your loss. And maybe bad luck for some handsome fighters.
